please_open_in_telegram: Please open the app in Telegram
the_app_is_not_available_in_this_browser: The app is not available in this browser. Please open it in Telegram.
no_bots: You don't have any bots yet. Please add one.
default_start: Welcome to [name] bot. Please send your feedback.
default_received: Thank you for your feedback. We will get back to you soon.
bot_token_hint: Bot token must be in format: numbers:letters (8-10 digits : 35 characters)
bot_successfully_added: Successfully added @{username} to your bots list. Please add to a group to work better.
